meta.name: description
meta.content: Seminole ISD is located in Seminole, TX.

li.a: Seminole Public Schools Federal Credit Union

figcaption.p: Capturing Kids’ Hearts National Showcase School nominee!
Carlye Winfrey | FFA State President & Alumna

div.div: Seminole ISD is known for outstanding vision, leadership, and work ethic. Did Seminole Independent School District influence you and put you on the road to success? The district has produced many successful individuals, from chemical, petroleum and mechanical engineers to doctors, lawyers, accountants and educators. Other students have entered the work force after high school and are very successful in business, agriculture and blue collar workers. The list does not end here! We are proud of all our students!

h3.a: Gov. Abbott orders Texas school facilities to remain closed

div.div: Seminole ISD to continue distance learning

h3.a: StayALERT School Safety Program Recognizes Seminole ISD Assistant Principal, Matt Hawkins for His Idea to Promote Safety

div.div: On behalf of Mr. Hawkins’ efforts, the StayALERT School Safety Program will contribute $750 to Seminole ISD’s safety and security. The district will be awarded discretionary dollars to help improve safety at Seminole ISD.

h3.a: "In the meantime, we want to be the light." - Kyle Lynch, Superintendent of Schools

div.div: The Seminole ISD Board of Trustees passed an emergency resolution to ensure SISD employees continue to be paid due to emergency conditions.

article.aria-label: Seminole ISD Board of Trustee Meeting

h3.a: Seminole ISD Board of Trustee Meeting

div.div: Seminole ISD provides top quality education on six campuses for approximately 2800 PreK-12th students. The district includes the High School, Success Center, Jr. High, Elementary, Primary and F. J. Young campuses.
